inline.description:
Ephemeral message
--------------------
1. Open Main Menu > Integrations > Slash Commands > Add Slash Command
2. Enter URL: http://hidden-peak-21733.herokuapp.com/test_ephemeral
3. Enter Trigger Word: test-ephemeral
4. Add
5. Done
6. In a test channel, type "/test-ephemeral" and post
inline.expectedResult: Returns a system message (grey text) from the "webhook" bot
